trans-unit.source: Represents a type that has its lifetime controlled by the workflow runtime.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en type som er den kontrolleres av kjøretiden arbeidsflyten.

trans-unit.source: Types derived from Handle have their lifetimes controlled by the workflow runtime.
trans-unit.target: Typer utledet fra referansen har sine levetid kontrolleres av kjøretiden arbeidsflyten.

trans-unit.source: For workflow variables of handle types, the runtime uses the required default constructor to create an instance of the type, assigns it to the <xref:System.Activities.Variable>, and calls <xref:System.Activities.Handle.OnInitialize%2A> when initializing the environment.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsflyten variabler referansen typer kjøretiden bruker nødvendige Standardkonstruktøren til å opprette en forekomst av typen, tilordner den til den <xref:System.Activities.Variable>, og kall <xref:System.Activities.Handle.OnInitialize%2A>under initialisering av miljøet.</xref:System.Activities.Handle.OnInitialize%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Variable>

trans-unit.source: When the variable goes out of scope, <xref:System.Activities.Handle.OnUninitialize%2A> is called.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Handle"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Activities.Handle"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from <xref:System.Activities.Handle> must provide a default constructor.
trans-unit.target: Klasser som er avledet fra <xref:System.Activities.Handle>må angi en standardkonstruktør.</xref:System.Activities.Handle>

trans-unit.source: Gets the name to be used by this <xref href="System.Activities.Handle"></xref> when added to an activity’s execution properties.
trans-unit.target: Henter navnet som skal brukes av dette <xref href="System.Activities.Handle"> </xref> når du legger til en aktivitet kjøring av egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: The name of derived type as provided by <xref:System.Type.FullName*>.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på den utledede typen som angitt av <xref:System.Type.FullName*>.</xref:System.Type.FullName*>

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime when the environment that contains the <xref href="System.Activities.Handle"></xref> is initialized.
trans-unit.target: Kalles av kjøretiden arbeidsflyten når miljøet som inneholder den <xref href="System.Activities.Handle"> </xref> er initialisert.

trans-unit.source: The environment in which the handle is being created.
Called by the workflow runtime when the <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Activities.Handle"></xref> goes out of scope.
trans-unit.target: Kalles av kjøretiden arbeidsflyten når den <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"> </xref> for den <xref href="System.Activities.Handle"> </xref> er utenfor området.

trans-unit.source: The environment in which the handle was created.
Gets the <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityInstance"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Activities.Handle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityInstance"> </xref> som inneholder den <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"> </xref> som inneholder den <xref href="System.Activities.Handle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The activity instance that contains the <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Activities.Handle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Aktivitets-forekomsten som inneholder den <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"> </xref> som inneholder den <xref href="System.Activities.Handle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> if the <xref href="System.Activities.Handle"></xref> has not been initialized.
trans-unit.target: Oppstår en <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>Hvis den <xref href="System.Activities.Handle"> </xref> er ikke initialisert.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: ThrowIfUninitialized gives custom handle derived class authors a convenient method to call from any methods or properties of the derived class that are not valid if the <xref:System.Activities.Handle> is uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: ThrowIfUninitialized angir egendefinerte referansen avledet klassen forfattere praktisk og metoder for å kalle fra noen metoder eller egenskaper i den utledede klassen som ikke er gyldig hvis det <xref:System.Activities.Handle>er ikke initialisert.</xref:System.Activities.Handle>
